Title: Relates to establishing a statewide multi-agency integrated data system for certain violations relating to motor vehicle registration and use
Summary: Establishes a statewide multi-agency integrated data system for certain violations relating to motor vehicle registration and use which may be accessed by local law enforcement agencies for the issuance of fines, tickets, or notices of liability related to traffic offenses.
LawCode: Amd ยง402, add ยง224-b, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to establishing a statewide multi-agency integrated data system for certain violations relating to motor vehicle registration and use
